Title: An Act Changing the Name of the Palawan School of Arts and Trades in the Municipality of Cuyo, Province of Palawan, to Palawan College of Arts and Trades
Data:
BATAS PAMBANSA Blg. 798
An Act Changing the Name of the Palawan School of Arts and Trades in the Municipality of Cuyo, Province of Palawan, to Palawan College of Arts and Trades
Section 1. The name of the Palawan School of Arts and Trades in the Municipality of Cuyo, Province of Palawan, is hereby changed to Palawan College of Arts and Trades.
Section 2. The Palawan College of Arts and Trades is authorized to continue offering the present collegiate courses of the Palawan School of Arts and Trades.
Section 3. This Act shall take effect upon its approval.
Approved: April 27, 1984
